message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm proposing a starting price of $22,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18,000. I believe it's a good starting point for us to work from.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $18,000 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $20,000. This price reflects the true value of the product and its potential benefits for you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $20,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $19,000. I believe this price is a fair reflection of the product's value and my budget.
